title: Acrobat
originalText: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.
normalizedText: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.

title: Al-Hadikhia
originalText: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
normalizedText: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

title: Alchemist
originalText: You have a Minion ability. When using this, the Storyteller may prompt you to choose differently.
normalizedText: You have a Minion ability. When using this, the Storyteller may prompt you to choose differently.

title: Alsaahir
originalText: Each day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.
normalizedText: Each day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

title: Amnesiac
originalText: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
normalizedText: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.

title: Angel
originalText: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.
normalizedText: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.

title: Apprentice
originalText: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).
normalizedText: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).

title: Artist
originalText: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.
normalizedText: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

title: Assassin
originalText: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.
normalizedText: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

title: Atheist
originalText: The Storyteller can break the game rules, and if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]
normalizedText: The Storyteller can break the game rules, and if executed, good wins, even if you are dead.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER no_evil_characters

title: Balloonist
originalText: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]
normalizedText: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER 0_or_1_outsider

title: Banshee
originalText: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.
normalizedText: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

title: Barber
originalText: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
normalizedText: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

title: Barista
originalText: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.
normalizedText: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.

title: Baron
originalText: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]
normalizedText: There are extra Outsiders in play.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER 2_outsiders

title: Beggar
originalText: You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober and healthy.
normalizedText: You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober and healthy.

title: Big Wig
originalText: Each nominee chooses a player: until voting, only they may speak & they are mad the nominee is good or they might die.
normalizedText: Each nominee chooses a player: until voting, only they may speak & they are mad the nominee is good or they might die.

title: Bishop
originalText: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.
normalizedText: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.

title: Boffin
originalText: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.
normalizedText: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

title: Bone Collector
originalText: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.
normalizedText: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

title: Boomdandy
originalText: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.
normalizedText: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

title: Bootlegger
originalText: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
normalizedText: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

title: Bounty Hunter
originalText: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
normalizedText: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER 1_townsfolk_is_evil

title: Buddhist

normalizedText: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.

title: Bureaucrat

normalizedText: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

title: Butcher
originalText: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.
normalizedText: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.

title: Butler

normalizedText: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

title: Cacklejack
originalText: Each day, choose a player: a different player changes character tonight.
normalizedText: Each day, choose a player: a different player changes character tonight.

title: Cannibal
originalText: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
normalizedText: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

title: Cerenovus

normalizedText: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

title: Chambermaid

normalizedText: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

title: Chef
originalText: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
normalizedText: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

title: Choirboy

normalizedText: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER the_king

title: Clockmaker
originalText: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
normalizedText: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

title: Courtier
originalText: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.
normalizedText: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

title: Cult Leader
originalText: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.
normalizedText: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.

title: Damsel
originalText: All Minions know a Damsel is in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
normalizedText: All Minions know a Damsel is in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.

title: Deus ex Fiasco
originalText: At least once per game, the Storyteller will make a mistake, correct it, and publicly admit to it.
normalizedText: At least once per game, the Storyteller will make a mistake, correct it, and publicly admit to it.

title: Deviant
originalText: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.
normalizedText: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.

title: Devil's Advocate
originalText: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
normalizedText: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

title: Djinn
originalText: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.
normalizedText: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.

title: Doomsayer
originalText: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.
normalizedText: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.

title: Dreamer
originalText: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
normalizedText: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

title: Drunk

normalizedText: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

title: Duchess

normalizedText: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.

title: Empath

normalizedText: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

title: Engineer

normalizedText: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

title: Evil Twin

normalizedText: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

title: Exorcist

normalizedText: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

normalizedText: When you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.

normalizedText: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

normalizedText: On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.

normalizedText: Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.

normalizedText: The 1st time you die, you don't.

normalizedText: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

title: Psychopath
originalText: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.
normalizedText: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

title: Pukka
originalText: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.
normalizedText: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

title: Puzzlemaster
originalText: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.
normalizedText: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

title: Ravenkeeper
originalText: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
normalizedText: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

title: Recluse
originalText: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.
normalizedText: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

title: Revolutionary
originalText: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, 1 of them registers falsely.
normalizedText: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, 1 of them registers falsely.

title: Riot
originalText: On day 3, Minions become Riot & nominees die but nominate an alive player immediately. This must happen.
normalizedText: On day 3, Minions become Riot & nominees die but nominate an alive player immediately. This must happen.

title: Sage
originalText: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
normalizedText: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

title: Sailor
originalText: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.
normalizedText: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

title: Saint
originalText: If you die by execution, your team loses.
normalizedText: If you die by execution, your team loses.

title: Savant
originalText: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.
normalizedText: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

title: Scapegoat
originalText: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.
normalizedText: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

title: Scarlet Woman
originalText: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)
normalizedText: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)

title: Seamstress
originalText: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.
normalizedText: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

title: Sentinel
originalText: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.
normalizedText: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.

title: Shabaloth
originalText: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
normalizedText: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

title: Shugenja
originalText: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.
normalizedText: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

title: Slayer
originalText: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.
normalizedText: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

title: Snake Charmer
originalText: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.
normalizedText: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

title: Snitch
originalText: Each Minion gets 3 bluffs.
normalizedText: Each Minion gets 3 bluffs.

title: Soldier
originalText: You are safe from the Demon.
normalizedText: You are safe from the Demon.

title: Spirit of Ivory
originalText: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.
normalizedText: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.

title: Spy
originalText: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
normalizedText: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

title: Steward
originalText: You start knowing 1 good player.
normalizedText: You start knowing 1 good player.

title: Storm Catcher
originalText: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.
normalizedText: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.

title: Summoner
originalText: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]
normalizedText: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER no_demon

title: Sweetheart
originalText: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.
normalizedText: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

title: Tea Lady
originalText: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.
normalizedText: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

title: Thief
originalText: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
normalizedText: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.

title: Tinker
originalText: You might die at any time.
normalizedText: You might die at any time.

title: Tor
originalText: Players don't know their character or alignment. They learn them when they die.
normalizedText: Players don't know their character or alignment. They learn them when they die.

title: Town Crier
originalText: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.
normalizedText: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

title: Toymaker
originalText: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.
normalizedText: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.

title: Undertaker
originalText: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
normalizedText: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

title: Vigormortis
originalText: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]
normalizedText: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER 1_outsider

title: Village Idiot
originalText: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]
normalizedText: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER 0_to_2_village_idiots_1_of_the_extras_is_drunk

title: Virgin
originalText: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.
normalizedText: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

title: Vizier
originalText: All players know you are the Vizier. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.
normalizedText: All players know you are the Vizier. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

title: Vortox
originalText: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.
normalizedText: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

title: Voudon
originalText: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.
normalizedText: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.

title: Washerwoman
originalText: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
normalizedText: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

title: Widow
originalText: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.
normalizedText: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.

title: Witch
originalText: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.
normalizedText: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

title: Wizard
originalText: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.
normalizedText: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.

title: Wraith
originalText: You may choose to open your eyes at night. You wake when other evil players do.
normalizedText: You may choose to open your eyes at night. You wake when other evil players do.

title: Xaan
originalText: On night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. [X Outsiders]
normalizedText: On night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk.  ACCEPT_MODIFIER x_outsiders

title: Yaggababble
originalText: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
normalizedText: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

title: Zealot
originalText: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.
normalizedText: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

title: Zenomancer
originalText: One or more players each have a goal. When achieved, that player learns a piece of true info.
normalizedText: One or more players each have a goal. When achieved, that player learns a piece of true info.

title: Zombuul
originalText: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
normalizedText: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
